# YMCA Cedar Glen Day Camp

## Basic Information
- **Provider**: YMCA of Greater Toronto
- **Location**: 123 Cedar Glen Rd, Markham, ON L3R 2T7
- **Website**: ymcagta.org/camps/cedar-glen
- **Phone**: (905) 555-0142
- **Email**: cedarglenadmin@ymcagta.org

## Distance & Commute

### Manual
- **Transit accessible**: No (suburban location)
- **Parking**: Available (free, dedicated lot)

### Computed
<!-- Auto-updated by commute-matrix skill -- do not edit manually -->
- **Distance from home**: 4.8 km
- **Drive time**: 12 minutes
- **Transit time**: 35 minutes
- **AM chain (drive)**: Home -> Camp -> Parent 1 Work = 28 min
- **PM chain (drive)**: Parent 1 Work -> Camp -> Home = 32 min
- **Status**: OK
- *Last computed: 2025-01-20*

## Programs Offered
### Explorer Camp (Ages 4-6)
- **Ages**: 4-6
- **Dates available**: Weeks of Jun 30 - Aug 22 (8 weeks)
- **Hours**: 9:00am - 4:00pm
- **Description**: Nature exploration, arts & crafts, water play, group games. Focus on socialization and outdoor discovery. Campers grouped by age (JK/SK and Grade 1).

### Adventure Camp (Ages 7-10)
- **Ages**: 7-10
- **Dates available**: Weeks of Jun 30 - Aug 22 (8 weeks)
- **Hours**: 9:00am - 4:00pm
- **Description**: Swimming, archery tag, canoeing, rock climbing, team sports, STEM activities. Weekly themes rotate. Red Cross swim levels offered.

### Leadership Camp (Ages 11-13)
- **Ages**: 11-13
- **Dates available**: Weeks of Jun 30 - Aug 22 (8 weeks)
- **Hours**: 9:00am - 4:00pm
- **Description**: Leadership development, outdoor skills, community service projects, advanced sports. Pathways to CIT program.

## Costs
| Item | Cost | Notes |
|------|------|-------|
| Base fee (daily) | $57 | Per day rate |
| Base fee (weekly) | $285 | All programs |
| Before care | $9/day ($45/week) | 7:30am - 9:00am |
| After care | $9/day ($45/week) | 4:00pm - 6:00pm |
| Lunch program | $0 | Bring your own (nut-free facility) |
| Registration fee | $50 | One-time per family |
| Materials fee | $0 | Included |
| Sibling discount | 10% | Applied to 2nd child onwards |
| Early bird discount | $20/week | Register by Feb 15 |
| Multi-week discount | 5% | 4+ weeks with same child |

## Quality Indicators
- **Certifications**: HIGH FIVE registered, Ontario Camps Association accredited
- **Staff ratios**: 1:6 (ages 4-6), 1:8 (ages 7-10), 1:10 (ages 11-13)
- **Staff training**: Standard First Aid, CPR-C, HIGH FIVE PHCD, Vulnerable Sector Screening
- **Years operating**: 28 years at this location
- **Reviews/reputation**: 4.3/5 Google Reviews (127 reviews). Parents praise outdoor facilities and staff quality. Some comments about large group sizes during peak weeks.

## Logistics
- **Registration status**: Open (as of Jan 15)
- **Registration deadline**: Rolling, but popular weeks (Jul 7-18) historically fill by mid-March
- **Cancellation policy**: Full refund if cancelled 14+ days before. 50% refund 7-13 days. No refund under 7 days. Medical exceptions with doctor's note.
- **What to bring**: Sunscreen, hat, water bottle, packed lunch (nut-free), swimsuit, towel, change of clothes
- **Allergy policy**: Nut-free facility. EpiPen protocols in place. Staff trained in allergy management.
- **Inclusion support**: Inclusion coordinator on staff. 1:1 support available with 4 weeks advance notice. Accessible facilities.

## Suitability
- **Good fit for**: Both children - Explorer Camp for Child 2 (age 5), Adventure Camp for Child 1 (age 7). Same facility means single dropoff/pickup. Sibling discount applies.
- **Concerns**: No lunch provided (need to pack daily). Popular weeks may fill before we register. 12-minute drive means before-care needed on days Parent 1 has early meetings.
- **Overall rating**: Strong match

## Notes
- Friends from school also attend this camp (social continuity)
- Child 1 could work toward swim levels during Adventure Camp
- Facility has indoor gymnasium for rainy days
- Open house scheduled for February 8 - worth attending
- CIT program at age 13 could be a pathway for Child 1 in future years

---
*Last updated: 2025-01-20*
*Source: YMCA GTA website, Google Reviews, word of mouth from school parents*
